description: Hashed identifiers used for analytics where the salt/key is stored in a separate vault.
Temporary session tokens used for cart management, not directly linked to a user profile until login.
Mobile advertising identifiers (IDFA/GAID) where the link to PII is strictly access-controlled.
Internal customer reference numbers used in data warehouses without direct PII columns.
Telemetry data from IoT devices containing serial numbers but no owner info.
